item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-28
item.description: Elon Musk activates Starlink satellite service in Ukraine after Vice PM calls upon him (2 minute read) Elon Musk activated Starlink’s satellite internet service in Ukraine after Mykhailo Fedorov, the Vice Prime Minister of Ukraine, tweeted at Musk asking for help.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-28
item.description: LinkedIn rolls out its freelance services marketplace globally after picking up 2M users in smaller US beta (4 minute read) LinkedIn is opening up its Service Marketplace, a service that lets freelancers advertise to those looking to hire people for short-term engagements.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-15
item.description: Facebook leak reveals Oculus Quest 2 as a 4K standalone VR headset (2 minute read) Facebook is expected to unveil the Oculus Quest 2 at the Facebook Connect conference later this week.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-07
item.description: Driving the Polestar 2, the first electric car with a brain by Google (8 minute read) The Polestar 2 is a new luxury electric vehicle from Volvo.
